Ben, yolo, I would suspect, is going to have a short shelf life because I understand that Katie Couric, when she launches her new talk show, is going to have a segment called ""What's Your Yolo?"" which is quite possibly the fastest way to make that term uncool.

What do you want to cross off your bucket list?
So she's turned yolo into bucket list.
